item.title: Building a Web App in Rails
item.description: A brilliant software engineering friend and I were recently discussing with another mutual friend the inefficiencies of employees filling out paper forms after completion of a construction job and the inefficiencies of transferring said forms to excel and so on. Said friend and I figured we could probably fix this with a web app for a nominal fee, but which would greatly increase our mutual friends’ productivity. A win win situation if there ever was one.
